pentago.ai

Class MiniMax

  • java.lang.Object
    • pentago.ai.MiniMax

  • public class MiniMax
extends java.lang.Object
    Implements the Minimax decision rule. For more information about Minimax decision rule, see https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Minimax

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private int maxPly
      Maximum level of Minimax checking
      private Player[] players
      Game players
      private Player turn
      Current turn player

      Constructor of Minimax

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private java.util.List<java.lang.String[]> filterCorners(java.util.List<java.lang.String[]> bestMoves)
      Filters moves that result to corner.
      private void getMax(GameState gameState, int ply)
      Performs max part of Minimax decision rule for turn player to maximize turn player score.
      private void getMin(GameState gameState, int ply)
      Performs pin part of Minimax decision rule for turn player to minimize turn player score that equals to maximizing opponent player score.
      private Player getOpponent(Player player)
      Gets opponent player.
      private GameState miniMax(GameState gameState, int ply)
      Minimax execution in specified layer for specified game state.
      private boolean moveResultsToCorner(java.lang.String[] move)
      Checks if specified move result to corner.
      java.lang.String[] run(Board board, Player turn)
      Runs Minimax decision rule to choose a move that maximizes turn player score in current state of the game.
      private java.lang.String[] selectBestMove(java.util.List<java.lang.String[]> bestMoves)
      Selects best move from equal score moves.
      private void setScore(GameState gameState)
      Computes and sets utility score for specified game state.

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public java.lang.String[] run(Board board,
                              Player turn)
        Runs Minimax decision rule to choose a move that maximizes turn player score in current state of the game.
        Parameters:
        board - game state
        turn - current player
        Returns:
        best move for player

      • miniMax

        private GameState miniMax(GameState gameState,
                          int ply)
        Minimax execution in specified layer for specified game state.
        Parameters:
        gameState - current game state
        ply - layer of execution
        Returns:
        game state with best score

      • setScore

        private void setScore(GameState gameState)
        Computes and sets utility score for specified game state. It uses following heuristics based on https://www.ke.tu-darmstadt.de/lehre/arbeiten/bachelor/2011/Buescher_Niklas.pdf :
        5-in-a-row 100,000
        4-in-a-row 1,000
        3-in-a-row 100
        piece in center 5
        piece at board 0
        Parameters:
        gameState - game state to compute utility score

      • getMax

        private void getMax(GameState gameState,
                    int ply)
        Performs max part of Minimax decision rule for turn player to maximize turn player score.
        Parameters:
        gameState - current game state
        ply - level of computation

      • getMin

        private void getMin(GameState gameState,
                    int ply)
        Performs pin part of Minimax decision rule for turn player to minimize turn player score that equals to maximizing opponent player score.
        Parameters:
        gameState - current game state
        ply - level of computation

      • selectBestMove

        private java.lang.String[] selectBestMove(java.util.List<java.lang.String[]> bestMoves)
        Selects best move from equal score moves. It first filters moves that result to corner and then randomly chooses from remain moves.
        Parameters:
        bestMoves - all moves to choose one
        Returns:
        chosen move

      • filterCorners

        private java.util.List<java.lang.String[]> filterCorners(java.util.List<java.lang.String[]> bestMoves)
        Filters moves that result to corner.
        Parameters:
        bestMoves - all moves to filter
        Returns:
        filtered moves

      • moveResultsToCorner

        private boolean moveResultsToCorner(java.lang.String[] move)
        Checks if specified move result to corner.
        Parameters:
        move - move to check
        Returns:
        true if move results to corder, false otherwise

      • getOpponent

        private Player getOpponent(Player player)
        Gets opponent player.
        Parameters:
        player - specified player
        Returns:
        opponet player
